page.title: 05SWIMMING LESSONS
page.content: Langwith Bassett School have a swimming allocation of 1x1/2hr session per week.We travel to the Creswell baths by bus.The swimming register is called on a Wednesday when 25 pupils are selected on a rota basis,with 3 others being elected reserves to cover for any absentees on Thursday,the day of the swimming lesson.The coach picks the 25 pupils and 2 staff who supervise all of their subsequent activities except the actual swimming which is the responsibility of a qualified swimming teacher.The swimming period lasts for 1/2 an hour,starting at 10.30a.m. during which time the pupils are taught basic water skills in preparation for passing their learners certificate.Once you have passed your learners,you can swim at the deep end of the pool improving your swimming.
